name: Space run (itch) (Pushok1012)
description: Hard 2D endless runner, increase your reaction and hero control.  You need to run as long as you can. Be aware of obstacles and red panel that is chasing you. Collect coins to increase your score, every coin gives you 20 points. Basic moves: D – going forward, S – fall faster, A – immediate stop, Space – jump. Good luck!  Music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/Towel_Defence_OST/Towel_Defence...
